title: Riot, did you remove the best part about Firefighter Tristana?
body:
Was playing URF as Gragas. Teammate was firefighter tristana. She was not making the alarm noises with her E as shown here
https://youtu.be/EzGovFowmcQ?t=1m8s

RIOT YOU REMOVED THE DINGY SOUND FROM FIREFIGHTER TRISTANA!

"As a firefighter who can barely play league as it is. This makes me sad. Rito pls"

replies.body:
Hey! 

This is a known issue and we're currently working on it. :] 

In the future, please use [this board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) if you'd like to report issues you find in game.
Pick Tristana in a Bot game and test it yourself. Perhaps you missed it
